name: Vishnu Pandey
detail: HOD English & Business Studies. With expertise in management and education, he blends business strategies with communication skills to foster academic excellence.

name: Ashwani Dhatwalia
detail: HOD PHYSICS. Combining engineering and physics with business insights, he leads the department to implement innovative teaching methods and practical applications in physics.

name: Pradeep Mishra
detail: HOD OF MATHEMATICS. A strong advocate for practical and theory-based learning, he inspires students to excel in competitive exams and encourages research in mathematical fields.

name: Saket
detail: HOD OF ECONOMICS. With a deep understanding of economic theory and real-world applications, he empowers students to explore and analyze global economic trends.

name: Vikalp
detail: HOD TGT AND SCIENCE. With a passion for physics, he inspires students to explore the wonders of science, fostering an environment of discovery and innovation.

name: Ravi
detail: HOD OF BIOLOGY. Specializing in biological sciences, he integrates theoretical knowledge with practical experiences, inspiring students to pursue research and careers in biology.

name: Om Prakash
detail: HOD PRT. Focused on primary education, he integrates business studies with pedagogy, ensuring students gain both academic knowledge and life skills.

name: Zafar
detail: HOD OF HUMANITIES. With a deep knowledge of political science and humanities, he inspires students to engage with social and political issues critically.

name: Sohail Ahmed
detail: HOD CHEMISTRY. Passionate about chemistry, he brings hands-on learning into the classroom, focusing on both theoretical and experimental aspects of the subject.

name: Pushpendra
degree: M.A. in History, B.Com, CMA(1), CA(ATC), B.Ed
detail: A history expert with professional credentials in accounting, he brings a unique perspective to teaching history, connecting past events with financial and economic growth.
